definition: Zi Chan (?-522 BC), statesman and philosopher during the Spring and Autumn period
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to give birth/to reproduce/to produce/product/resource/estate/property

sentences.english: "Electronics are a lot easier to compare online, " Robertson said.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特森認爲，“網上更容易比較電子產品的價格。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.
sentences.chinese: 我們的周邊是手機配件及電子產品出口的專業市場。

sentences.english: In the electronic products used as demoulding agent of electronic components.
sentences.chinese: 在電子產品中可作電子元件的脫模劑。

sentences.english: Is a professional manufacturer of LED light emitting diode of the high-tech enterprise of electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 是專業生產LED發光二極管電子產品的高科技企業。

sentences.english: Tom always flaunts his electronic productions. I really want to make him feel jealous once.
sentences.chinese: 總是炫耀他那些電子產品，我也想讓他嫉妒眼紅一回。

sentences.english: To guarantee a higher level of safety for electrical consumer products.
sentences.chinese: 保障消費性電子產品有一更高之安全水準。

sentences.english: The plant makes electronic components for cars and consumer devices.
sentences.chinese: 該工廠主要生產齊射電子元件和消費電子產品。

sentences.english: Chengdu and Mianyang are the production bases for textiles and electronics products.
sentences.chinese: 成都和綿陽爲紡織和電子產品基地。

sentences.english: I also do some waterproofing to electronics.
sentences.chinese: 我也做一些防水到電子產品。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用電器，日用品，鐘錶電子產品手板製作。

sentences.english: An encouraging outlook for electronics maker Panasonic lifted market sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 電子產品製造商松下電器前景樂觀，增加了市場信心。

sentences.english: I find shopping for electronics is the worst.
sentences.chinese: 而我發現購買電子產品則最讓人蛋疼。

sentences.english: With the development of electronic technology and electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 隨着電子科技的發展和電子產品。

sentences.english: Perhaps you’ll start with a certain category of belongings, like electronics.
sentences.chinese: 也許你可以從一個種類開始整理，如電子產品。

sentences.english: But to specific Xie Qing is carried out by the food industry or the electronics.
sentences.chinese: 而是要具體的寫清所從事的是食品業還是電子產品。

sentences.english: Zi Chan smiled, "I am the boss here.
sentences.chinese: 子產笑了，“這裏我說了算。

definition: prime minister (in ancient China)

uniform
(literary) granary
to be well-mannered
Zi Gong or Duanmu Ci 端木賜|端木赐[Duan1 mu4 Ci4] (520 BC-), disciple of Confucius
Yan Hui (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius, also known as Yan Yuan 顏淵|颜渊[Yan2 Yuan1]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
little mistake/minor offense/slightly too much
expedient
ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
to travel around many countries (idiom); peregrinations/refers to the travels of Confucius
秦越人[Qin2 Yue4 ren2] (407-310 BC), Warring States physician known for his medical skills, nicknamed Bian Que after the earliest known Chinese physician allegedly from the 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] era
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
family tradition/family principles
old anecdote/stories passed on from former times
